Metadata: Production of hydroxy fatty acids by cell suspension cultures of the marine brown alga "Laminaria saccharina"

Photolithotroph​ic cell suspension cultures established from the microscopic gametophytic life phase of "Laminaria saccharina" produced three hydroxy fatty acids. The yields of the three ranged from 100 to 1000 micrograms product/g dry biomass. The effects of several linolenic acids on stimulating lipoxygenase oxidation are also described.
